analysis.original_question:
Find the shortest path between MTL_VPN_SSL_RANGE and the device VwLogibecDCR01.
Show me all the network hops, including VPN connections, firewalls, and any IPSEC tunnels.
Display the complete connectivity path with all relationship types.

meta.original_query: MATCH (start:Node {name: 'MTL_VPN_SSL_RANGE'}), (end:Node {name: 'VwLogibecDCR01'}) OPTIONAL MATCH p=allShortestPaths((start)-[*]-(end)) UNWIND relationships(p) as rel RETURN DISTINCT start, end, p, type(rel) as relationshipType
